title: Test SSR compatibility
description:
Verify SSR still works correctly with Nuxt 4.

Steps:
1. Build the playground: pnpm run build
2. Preview: pnpm run preview
3. Test all pages render server-side
4. Check for hydration mismatches
5. Verify ClientOnly wrappers still work

Test: nuxt build && nuxt preview works without errors
acceptance_criteria: SSR build and preview working correctly
